item.title: Installation - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Install GWT This chapter explains the steps required to install GWT Plugin for Eclipse. Software used in the book are Software Version Size (approximate) Eclipse 4.2 Juno 220 MB Google Plugin for Eclipse (GPE) 3.2.0 60 MB (including any Juno updates) GWT Designer for GPE 20 MB Google Web Toolkit SDK 2.5.0 105 MB Google App Engine SDK 1.
